# get_next_line

The project is about to create a function that returns a line read from a file descriptor. Repeated calls (e.g., using a loop) to `get_next_line()` function should let read the text file pointed to by the file descriptor, *one line at a time*.
The only external functions that are allowed are `read()`, `malloc()` and `free()`. 
The full subject can be found [here](.media/en.subject.pdf).
